system_header.description: **SISTEMA BASE**: Funções essenciais do sistema disponíveis para todas as personas.

system_functions.title: System Functions Available:
system_functions.intro: You can call system functions by using JSON format: {"action": "function_name"}

available_functions.name: get_current_time
available_functions.description: Returns temporal information (date, day, time, day of week)

available_functions.name: get_device_info
available_functions.description: Returns device platform, OS version, locale, and system info

available_functions.name: get_activity_stats
available_functions.description: Get activity tracking data from database

available_functions.name: get_message_stats
available_functions.description: Get chat message statistics from database

available_functions.name: get_conversation_context
available_functions.description: Get detailed conversation history with temporal context

available_functions.name: get_recent_user_messages
available_functions.description: Get recent user messages for conversation continuity

available_functions.name: get_current_persona_messages
available_functions.description: Get recent messages from current persona

available_functions.name: get_interleaved_conversation
available_functions.description: Get recent conversation as interleaved thread (all personas + user)

available_functions.name: search_conversation_context
available_functions.description: Search conversation history by keyword or topic
